title: Person of Interest: Amy Acker and Michael Emerson Tour the Subway Set
author: Tina Kara
comment: Amy Acker is so beautiful and perfect 😍
"I can't stop limping, I' m not crippled" This is why we love you Michael..❤❤
I could listen to Michael Emerson read a whole phonebook and thorougly enjoy it.

It is really hard to hate these two personalities. Emerson's Finch and Acker's Root are arguably the two best examples of perfect actor-character match, and extremely effective casting including, Reese, shaw, Carter, Fusco and Greer is undoubtedly one significant factor responsible for the success of this series., not to mention the outstanding production design including the presentation of this  subway set. I have just finished watching all 103 episodes on DVD and I must admit  Person of Interest far exceeded my initial expectation in all respects.
I´m literally crying cause Amy is so beautiful and cute
description: POI EPK: Michael Emerson and Amy Acker take you behind the scenes of the Team POI subway set.
